description: Non-material amendments to application ref: P2016/0878/S73, comprising changes to the locations and sizes of rooflights and roof hatch, changes to basement floorplan, blocking up the window adjacent to the lift shaft, and amendments to the extension roof.
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 2 of permission P2016/0878/S73 is acceptable:

"DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

(a) The following documents approved by application P2015/0971/FUL:
Structural Survey; Summary of Community Engagement Sustainable Design and Construction Statement Energy Statement rev N3 dated 18/6/2015; Overheating Assessment Statement rev N1 dated 19/6/2015 BREEAM Pre- Assessment; Daylight/ Sunlight Assessment Rev170615 dated June 2015; Health Impact Assessment; Economic Benefits Assessment; Ecology Survey; Online Construction and Site Waste Management Plan; Utilities Report; Historic Environment Assessment; Basement Construction Methodology; Ventilation Statement; Contaminated Land Assessment. 

(b) The following drawings approved by application P2015/0971/FUL:
14-070-P001, 14-070-P099, 14-070-P100, 14-070-P101, 14-070-P102, 14-070-P103, 14-070-P120, 14-070-P121, 14-070-P122, 14-070-P130, 14-070-P131, 14-070-P132, 14-070-P133, 14-070-P134, , 14-070-P136 revA, , 14-070-P400, 14-070-P504 revA, PCD1113_AT-J02, PCD1113-AT-J01, PCD1113-AT-J02A and PCD1113-AT-J01A.

(c) The following additional documents approved by planning permission P2016/0878/S73:
Energy Statement Addendum 19/02/16; Mechanical, Electrical and Public Health Services Utilities Report; Transport Statement PCD-1113-TS-RP-02; Heritage Impact Assessment 14941/MH/HH (04 March 2016); Planning Statement 14941/MH/HH (03 March 2016); Design and Access Statement rev004 (February 2016); GDM Partnership "Addition of condensing Units to serve SME Units" revN1 12/04/16; Mechanical, Electrical and Public Health Specification Section 5 (GDM, 04/05/2016).
